content: I think I'll start by creating a note-taking system that works for me, and then categorize my notes and insights by workshop. I'll also try to use a template or framework for each note or insight, and tag and label them based on themes or topics. I like the idea of creating an index or table of contents for each notebook or digital tool, and scheduling regular review sessions to refine my notes and insights. Since I attended five workshops in the past three months, I'm curious - do you have any suggestions on how to reflect on my progress and growth over time, especially in terms of how these workshops have impacted my personal and professional development?
